// const API_ENDPOINT = 'http://localhost:8080'
import config from'./config';var ApiService={getPets:function getPets(){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/api/pets")).then(function(res){return res.json();});},getQueue:function getQueue(){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/api/people")).then(function(res){return res.json();});},addPerson:function addPerson(person){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/api/people"),{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(person)});},removePerson:function removePerson(){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/api/people"),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'}});},removePet:function removePet(pet){return fetch("".concat(config.API_ENDPOINT,"/api/pets/").concat(pet),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'content-type':'application/json'}});}};export default ApiService;
